title: Fulfill Sponsorship Contract Obligations
description: A team needs to provide a sponsor with a report detailing all the times their logo was shown during last month's broadcasts, as required by their contract.

tasks.description: Retrieve the sponsorship contract to understand the reporting requirements.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the contract requires a monthly fulfillment report.

tasks.description: Analyze the broadcast logs from the last month to find all instances where the sponsor's logo was displayed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of all timestamps when the logo appeared.

tasks.description: Create a formal sponsorship fulfillment report with the collected data.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a detailed report for the sponsor.

tasks.description: Send the report to the sponsor.
